profile.en:
The self-proclaimed boss of Problem Solver 68.

Aru expanded the Gehenna Academy's Problem Solver 68 club without permission to conduct illegal business activities. She aspires to be seen as a dashing and debonair villain, but her frequent blunders always expose her as a poser.
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、便利屋68の自称社長。

ゲヘナ学園の部活である便利屋68で、好き勝手に不法事業を行っている少女。アル本人はかっこいい悪党としてふるまいたいと思っているものの、抜けているところが多いためすぐにバレてしまう。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
自称便利屋68的社长。

恣意扩大格黑娜学园的社团——便利屋68，正胡乱进行非法事业。
虽然阿露本人希望自己看起来像帅气的坏蛋，但却破绽百出，一下子就显露出自己呆萌的真面目。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园所属，便利屋68的自称社长。

在格黑娜学园的社团便利屋68里胡乱进行非法事业的少女。
虽然亚瑠本人希望自己看起来像帅气的坏蛋，但却时常事与愿违，马上就会露出自己的真面目。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
自称是便利屋68的社长。

便利屋68原本是歌赫娜的社团，但她将其随意进行扩张，经营非法事业。
爱露希望自己在别人眼里是个帅气的反派，不过她却经常闹出乌龙，一不小心就会在人前暴露自己的真面目。

gacha.jp:
ふふふ、素晴らしい選択よ
先生
gacha.zh_cn_jp:
呼呼呼。这是明智的选择，
老师。
gacha.zh_cn_tw:
哼哼哼，这是明智的选择唷
老师
gacha.zh_cn_cn:
哈哈，真是个明智的选择啊。
老师。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒爱露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，爱露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长爱露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为日富美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为日步美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为日富美对于黑市比较熟悉，众人于是邀请她为众人带路。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。阿露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。爱露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，阿露最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，亚瑠最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，爱露最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。阿露在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；其他成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被阿露和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。茜香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，爱露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的爱露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，春香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么爱露不先收钱办事，爱露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而春香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，阿露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亚瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，爱露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。春香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的爱露。对策委员会的学生没明白爱露的内心就指责她。结果爱露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是歌赫娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为阿露的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为亚瑠的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连无月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为爱露的失语使得春香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然将视线与春香的对上了。春香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description
desc.zh_cn: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心沙勒这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子希望阿露尽快离开，但阿露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 佳世子希望亚瑠尽快离开，但亚瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子希望爱露尽快离开，但爱露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳代子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.zh_cn: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和芹香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和茜香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和芹香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。阿露表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示阿露真是令人操心。

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.jp: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。阿露表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。亚瑠表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。爱露表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音和芹香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绫音和茜香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音和芹香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“对策委员会”尚存抗争，但绫音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description
desc.zh_cn: BG_DemolitionCity.jpg Description

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.jp: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.zh_cn: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.jp: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在实验台上，低着头，怨恨自己的天真。他对不起对策委员会的所有人，也对不起曾经的学生会成员梦前辈。再一次地，她被大人骗了。

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亚瑠抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。爱露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.jp: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.zh_cn: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.jp: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn_jp: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往歌赫娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和歌赫娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.jp: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师来到歌赫娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Hifumi reports Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designates Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.jp: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，阿露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳世子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，亚瑠表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，爱露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日富美与三一学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的对策委员会一行人面前。对策委员会趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的阿露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的亚瑠和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达阿拜多斯高中旧本馆的对策委员会一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的爱露和便利屋68一行人即时出现帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日富美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日步美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。日富美此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与三一毫无关联。通讯结束后，对策委员会几人开始突破。

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.jp: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经阿拜多斯学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时便利屋68全员赶到，开始支援。对策委员会将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找星野。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.jp: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯因为突如其来的异常现象而陷入混乱。老师使用大人的卡片企图收拾眼前的混乱状况。来历不明的存在出现在老师面前，并且留下了耐人寻味的忠告。

desc.en: 花子聽說有急事後來到茶會所在的陽臺，見到了茶會的渚、修女會的櫻子和救援騎士團的美禰。花子希望大家能夠一起齊心協力，即便派系不同。

desc.zh_cn_tw: 花子听说有急事后来到茶会所在的阳台，见到了茶会的渚、修女会的樱子和救援骑士团的美祢。花子希望大家能够一起齐心协力，即便派系不同。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 站在夏萊的頂樓上，老師遇見了黑色西裝人。黑服說他所在的組織已被摧毀，而色彩將“胡狼神”扭曲為“阿努比斯”反轉為其恐怖的一面，而後者也遵循著其命運的指導，給基沃託斯帶來終結。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，自己虽然先前认为色彩没有意识、无法理解，但在这次行动中，他们却明显感觉到色彩具有了意识和意义――色彩试图吸收基沃托斯所有崇高和神秘的概念，将其化为己有。

desc.en: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。

desc.en: 詩音向大螢幕前的所有人通報即時的新聞動態，提到塔的情況尚不清楚，基沃託斯各地也出現了來源不明的兵力。隨後夏萊的通知抵達，其中明確表明各自治區的學生立即避難，切勿靠近黑色高塔。
desc.jp: 詩音向大螢幕前的所有人通報即時的新聞動態，提到塔的情況尚不清楚，基沃託斯各地也出現了來源不明的兵力。隨後夏萊的通知抵達，其中明確表明各自治區的學生立即避難，切勿靠近黑色高塔。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诗音向大屏幕前的所有人通报即时的新闻动态，提到塔的情况尚不清楚，基沃托斯各地也出现了来源不明的兵力。随后夏莱的通知抵达，其中明确表明各自治区的学生立即避难，切勿靠近黑色高塔。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 攻略聖所的作戰開始了。對策委員會與便利屋68分配在阿拜多斯沙漠；C&C、英美、弦生和イチカ分配在千年廢墟地區；遊戲開發部、陽奈和RABBIT小隊分配在史林皮亞等待命令。

desc.en: 便利屋68主動承擔引誘薇娜的職責，他們將透過列車進行移動。佳世子提醒眾人防止受傷的重要性。亞瑠想在最後的時候把列車炸掉，野乃美表示了同意。

desc.en: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.jp: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.zh_cn: 优香对这两人居然因为分组而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在两人不肯让步的情况下，优香勒令两人用猜拳的方式决定，否则计划就要赶不上了。无奈，两人只好以此决胜。

desc.en: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.jp: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会其他人听到绫音要走坚决不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果会发生战斗，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他们要亲手带回白子。绫音提醒众人这个计划并不是百分百成功，就在这时一阵声音打断了绫音。

desc.en: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.jp: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋全员来拜访对策委员会众人。阿露指出，这种时刻更不应该向后看，而应向前看。便利屋表示只要有老师在，一切一定都会成功。对策委员会回想起以前的种种，坚定了信心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋全员来拜访对策委员会众人。亚瑠指出，这种时刻更不应该向后看，而应向前看。便利屋表示只要有老师在，一切一定都会成功。对策委员会回想起以前的种种，坚定了信心。

desc.en: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部对生命守护者并非真正意义上的战舰而感到失望，同时也因为计划的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。爱丽丝坚决要去，她认为自己是船上唯一携带着武器的人，她想保护大家，为大家作出些贡献。柚子对爱丽丝的想法表示赞同，说明她不想再让大家分开――况且，还有老师在呢。柚子说正是因为爱丽丝才让她走到了今天这一步，提议大家还是一起去最好；桃井和绿最后接受。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部对生命守护者并非真正意义上的战舰而感到失望，同时也因为计划的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。爱丽丝坚决要去，她认为自己是船上唯一携带着武器的人，她想保护大家，为大家作出些贡献。柚子对爱丽丝的想法表示赞同，说明她不想再让大家分开――况且，还有老师在呢。柚子说正是因为爱丽丝才让她走到了今天这一步，提议大家还是一起去最好；桃井和绿最后接受。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部对生命守护者并非真正意义上的战舰而感到失望，同时也因为计划的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。爱丽丝坚决要去，她认为自己是船上唯一携带着武器的人，她想保护大家，为大家作出些贡献。柚子对爱丽丝的想法表示赞同，说明她不想再让大家分开――况且，还有老师在呢。柚子说正是因为爱丽丝才让她走到了今天这一步，提议大家还是一起去最好；桃和绿最后接受。

desc.en: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝说自己也曾害怕过，因为Kei仍在爱丽丝的数据中。爱丽丝提起老师跟她谈论“自己选择成为什么”的事情，表示自己这次想要成为勇者。所有人支持爱丽丝的话，表示爱丽丝要成为“宇宙勇者”了。

desc.en: 花子來到補課部所在的教室，向各位告別。花子談起他們與老師以前發生的種種事情，似問非問地提出“要是老師不在會怎麼樣。”眾人隨後請花子放心，表示他們會守護好三一的。
desc.jp: 花子來到補課部所在的教室，向各位告別。花子談起他們與老師以前發生的種種事情，似問非問地提出“要是老師不在會怎麼樣。”眾人隨後請花子放心，表示他們會守護好三一的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 花子来到补习部所在的教室，向各位告别。花子谈起他们与老师以前发生的种种事情，似问非问地提出“要是老师不在会怎么样。”众人随后请花子放心，表示他们会守护好崔尼蒂的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 花子来到补课部所在的教室，向各位告别。花子谈起他们与老师以前发生的种种事情，似问非问地提出“要是老师不在会怎么样。”众人随后请花子放心，表示他们会守护好三一的。

desc.en:

desc.en: 莉音批評了陽葵，說放棄這種話可不像能出自她口。陽葵先是感到詫異，但隨後發現倒計時停止在先前的9秒鐘——莉音解釋是她用多次元詮釋系統抑制了方舟的連線，但只不過是權宜之計。莉音向眾人請求幫助，陽葵則指出這艘船一定有訊號中繼器之類的東西，只要破壞就能斷開連線；在斷開期間，只要能修復好生命守衛者艦艇，就能反而啟動方舟的自爆程式。
desc.jp: 莉音批評了陽葵，說放棄這種話可不像能出自她口。陽葵先是感到詫異，但隨後發現倒計時停止在先前的9秒鐘——莉音解釋是她用多次元詮釋系統抑制了方舟的連線，但只不過是權宜之計。莉音向眾人請求幫助，陽葵則指出這艘船一定有訊號中繼器之類的東西，只要破壞就能斷開連線；在斷開期間，只要能修復好生命守衛者艦艇，就能反而啟動方舟的自爆程式。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央批评了日鞠，说放弃这种话可不像能出自她口。日鞠先是感到诧异，但随后发现倒计时停止在先前的9秒钟——莉央解释是她用多次元诠释系统抑制了方舟的连接，但只不过是权宜之计。莉央向众人请求帮助，日鞠则指出这艘船一定有信号中继器之类的东西，只要破坏就能断开连接；在断开期间，只要能修复好生命守卫者舰艇，就能反而启动方舟的自爆程序。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音批评了阳葵，说放弃这种话可不像能出自她口。阳葵先是感到诧异，但随后发现倒计时停止在先前的9秒钟——莉音解释是她用多次元诠释系统抑制了方舟的连接，但只不过是权宜之计。莉音向众人请求帮助，阳葵则指出这艘船一定有信号中继器之类的东西，只要破坏就能断开连接；在断开期间，只要能修复好生命守卫者舰艇，就能反而启动方舟的自爆程序。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央批评了日鞠，说放弃这种话可不像能出自她口。日鞠先是感到诧异，但随后发现倒计时停止在先前的9秒钟——莉央解释是她用多次元诠释系统抑制了方舟的连接，但只不过是权宜之计。莉央向众人请求帮助，日鞠则指出这艘船一定有信号中继器之类的东西，只要破坏就能断开连接；在断开期间，只要能修复好生命守卫者舰艇，就能反而启动方舟的自爆程序。

desc.en: 然而陽葵表示從上層到下層有至少1200m遠，並且花子指出安全系統很難破壞，在駭入的情況下唯有同時破壞東、西兩邊的解除裝置才能開啟下層大門——但即便那樣也只能持續五秒。更麻煩的是，下層還沒有人能這麼快移動。
desc.jp: 然而陽葵表示從上層到下層有至少1200m遠，並且花子指出安全系統很難破壞，在駭入的情況下唯有同時破壞東、西兩邊的解除裝置才能開啟下層大門——但即便那樣也只能持續五秒。更麻煩的是，下層還沒有人能這麼快移動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 然而日鞠表示从上层到下层有至少1200m远，并且花子指出安全系统很难破坏，在骇入的情况下唯有同时破坏东、西两边的解除装置才能打开下层大门——但即便那样也只能持续五秒。更麻烦的是，下层还没有人能这么快移动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 然而阳葵表示从上层到下层有至少1200m远，并且花子指出安全系统很难破坏，在骇入的情况下唯有同时破坏东、西两边的解除装置才能打开下层大门——但即便那样也只能持续五秒。更麻烦的是，下层还没有人能这么快移动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 然而日鞠表示从上层到下层有至少1200m远，并且花子指出安全系统很难破坏，在骇入的情况下唯有同时破坏东、西两边的解除装置才能打开下层大门——但即便那样也只能持续五秒。更麻烦的是，下层还没有人能这么快移动。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

hobby.en: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
hobby.jp: ペロログッズ集め、可愛いもの集め、ショッピング、相談に乗ること
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 收集佩洛洛周边商品、购物、听人说话
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集佩洛洛商品、收集可爱的东西、购物、参加咨询
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集佩洛洛周边玩具、购物、做倾听者

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
